en-US.about_me_text: Hello, my name is Henrique and I am 27 years old. Development work software for almost 5 years and,currently, I work with the programming language C#, specifically on the back-end. I am involved in a project for a group in the retail sector, where the system is used in three stores belonging to the same customer, one of which is the largest Apple Premium Reseller in Latin America.
